summary: "A Goofy Movie" is a 1995 Disney animated film based on the TV show "Goof Troop." It follows Goofy and his son Max on a fishing trip across the USA. Directed by Kevin Lima, the film gives Goofy more depth, showing his emotional side. It features voices by Bill Farmer, Jim Cummings, and new additions like Jason Marsden and Pauly Shore. Tevin Campbell provides vocals for the fictional pop star Powerline. Despite mixed reviews and a weak box office performance, the film gained a cult following after its home media release and led to a sequel, "An Extremely Goofy Movie," in 2000.
title: A Goofy Movie
